languages.text: "Да никакие мы не еретики!" {n}Один из окруженных толпой людей вскидывает голову.{/n} "Мы бежали от еретиков и еле ушли живыми! И чумы на нашей планете никакой не было — только служки {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, целое полчище их!" {n}— он сплевывает.{/n} "И если хотите винить кого — вините тех, кто бросил наш мир! Вините губернатора! Вините {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g}! Вините владык Кьявы Гамма, что бросили ее в темный час!"

traits.locale_text: "Да никакие мы не еретики!" {n}Один из окруженных толпой людей смело вскакивает на ноги.{/n} "Мы бежали от еретиков и еле ушли живыми! И чумы на нашей планете никакой не было — только служки Архиврага, целое полчище их!" {n}— он сплевывает.{/n} "И если хотите винить кого — вините тех, кто бросил наш мир! Вините губернатора! Вините техножрецов! Вините владык Кьявы Гамма, что бросили ее в темный час!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"
languages.original_text: "Да никакие мы не еретики!" {n}Один из окруженных толпой людей вскидывает голову.{/n} "Мы бежали от еретиков и еле ушли живыми! И чумы на нашей планете никакой не было — только служки {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}, целое полчище их!" {n}— он сплевывает.{/n} "И если хотите винить кого — вините тех, кто бросил наш мир! Вините губернатора! Вините {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g}! Вините владык Кьявы Гамма, что бросили ее в темный час!"

traits.locale_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd bravely jumps to his feet.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the Archenemy's lackeys, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the Tech-Priests! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: 「俺たちは異端者じゃない！」{n}群衆に囲まれたひとりが胸を張った。{/n}「俺たちは命からがら異端者から逃げてきた！我々の惑星に疫病などない…{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}がいたんだ！それも、大軍がな！」{n}彼は地面に唾を吐いた。{/n}「誰かを責めたいなら俺たちの惑星を見捨てた奴を責めろ！総督を責めろ！{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}を責めろ！暗黒の時代に飲まれるキアヴァ・ガンマを見捨てた主たちを責めろ！」
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちは異端者じゃない！」{n}群衆に囲まれたひとりが胸を張った。{/n}「俺たちは命からがら異端者から逃げてきた！我々の惑星に疫病などない…{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}がいたんだ！それも、大軍がな！」{n}彼は地面に唾を吐いた。{/n}「誰かを責めたいなら俺たちの惑星を見捨てた奴を責めろ！総督を責めろ！{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}を責めろ！暗黒の時代に飲まれるキアヴァ・ガンマを見捨てた主たちを責めろ！」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: “我们根本不是异端分子！”{n}人群之中，有个人扬起了下巴。{/n}“我们是从异端分子手里逃出来的，差点就没命了！我们的行星根本没有瘟疫，只有{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆从，他们有一整支军队！”{n}他朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“如果你想要怪谁，就怪那些抛弃我们世界的人吧！去怪总督吧！去怪那些{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}吧！还有基亚瓦伽马星的统治者们，在最黑暗的时刻抛弃了它！”
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: “我们根本不是异端分子！”{n}人群之中，有个人扬起了下巴。{/n}“我们是从异端分子手里逃出来的，差点就没命了！我们的行星根本没有瘟疫，只有{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的仆从，他们有一整支军队！”{n}他朝地上吐了口口水。{/n}“如果你想要怪谁，就怪那些抛弃我们世界的人吧！去怪总督吧！去怪那些{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}吧！还有基亚瓦伽马星的统治者们，在最黑暗的时刻抛弃了它！”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: «¡No somos herejes!». {n}Una de las personas rodeadas por la multitud levanta la barbilla.{/n} «¡Nos escapamos de ellos y casi no lo contamos! En nuestro planeta no está la plaga, pero ¡sí los secuaces del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}! ¡Y todo un ejército, además!». {n}Escupe en el suelo.{/n} «Pero si queréis echarle la culpa a alguien, ¡echádsela a los que abandonaron nuestro mundo! ¡Echádsela al gobernador! ¡Echádsela a los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}! ¡Echádsela a los señores de Kiava Gamma que nos desecharon cuando más lo necesitábamos!».
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No somos herejes!». {n}Una de las personas rodeadas por la multitud levanta la barbilla.{/n} «¡Nos escapamos de ellos y casi no lo contamos! En nuestro planeta no está la plaga, pero ¡sí los secuaces del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}! ¡Y todo un ejército, además!». {n}Escupe en el suelo.{/n} «Pero si queréis echarle la culpa a alguien, ¡echádsela a los que abandonaron nuestro mundo! ¡Echádsela al gobernador! ¡Echádsela a los {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}! ¡Echádsela a los señores de Kiava Gamma que nos desecharon cuando más lo necesitábamos!».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: {n}L'un des hommes acculés par la foule se redresse.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas des hérétiques ! Nous avons fui les hérétiques, ils ont failli nous tuer ! Et il n'y a pas de peste sur notre planète... juste une armée de sbires du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ! » {n}Il crache par terre.{/n} « Et si vous cherchez quelqu'un à accuser, prenez-vous-en plutôt à ceux qui ont abandonné notre monde ! Au gouverneur ! Aux {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ! Aux maîtres de Kiava Gamma qui lui ont tourné le dos dans l'adversité ! »
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des hommes acculés par la foule se redresse.{/n} « Nous ne sommes pas des hérétiques ! Nous avons fui les hérétiques, ils ont failli nous tuer ! Et il n'y a pas de peste sur notre planète... juste une armée de sbires du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ! » {n}Il crache par terre.{/n} « Et si vous cherchez quelqu'un à accuser, prenez-vous-en plutôt à ceux qui ont abandonné notre monde ! Au gouverneur ! Aux {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} ! Aux maîtres de Kiava Gamma qui lui ont tourné le dos dans l'adversité ! »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Wir sind keine Ketzer!" {n}Einer der von der Menge umstellten Männer reckt sein Kinn noch vorne.{/n} "Wir sind vor den Ketzern geflohen, kaum mit dem Leben davongekommen! Und es gab keine Seuche auf unserem Planeten – nur die Schergen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}, eine ganze Armee von ihnen!" {n}Er spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Und wenn Ihr jemandem die Schuld geben wollt – dann denen, die unsere Welt im Stich gelassen haben! Gebt dem Gouverneur die Schuld! Gebt den {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} die Schuld! Gebt den Herren von Kiava Gamma die Schuld, die es in der dunkelsten Stunde verlassen haben!"
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind keine Ketzer!" {n}Einer der von der Menge umstellten Männer reckt sein Kinn noch vorne.{/n} "Wir sind vor den Ketzern geflohen, kaum mit dem Leben davongekommen! Und es gab keine Seuche auf unserem Planeten – nur die Schergen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}, eine ganze Armee von ihnen!" {n}Er spuckt auf den Boden.{/n} "Und wenn Ihr jemandem die Schuld geben wollt – dann denen, die unsere Welt im Stich gelassen haben! Gebt dem Gouverneur die Schuld! Gebt den {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} die Schuld! Gebt den Herren von Kiava Gamma die Schuld, die es in der dunkelsten Stunde verlassen haben!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee

languages.text: "Kâfir değiliz biz!" {n}Kalabalığın etrafını sardığı kişilerden biri başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Kâfirlerden kaçtık, canımızı zor kurtardık! Gezegenimizde hastalık falan da yoktu, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} askerleri vardı. Koca bir ordu hem de!" {n}Yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Derdiniz birilerini suçlamaksa dünyamızı bir başına bırakanları suçlayın! Valiyi suçlayın! {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipleri{/g} suçlayın! En zor anında Kiava Gama'yı kaderine terk eden, sözde efendilerini suçlayın!"
languages.original_text: "We're no heretics!" {n}One of the people surrounded by the crowd raises his chin.{/n} "We ran from the heretics, barely escaped with our lives! And there was no plague on our planet — only the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s minions, a whole army of them!" {n}He spits on the ground.{/n} "And if you want to blame anyone — blame those who abandoned our world! Blame the governor! Blame the {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}! Blame the masters of Kiava Gamma who forsook it in its darkest hour!"

traits.locale_text: "Biz kâfir değiliz!" {n}Kalabalığın etrafını sardığı kişilerden biri başını dikleştiriyor.{/n} "Biz kâfirlerden kaçtık, zar zor hayatta kaldık! Gezegenimizde hastalık falan da yoktu, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın askerleri vardı. Koca bir ordu hem de!" {n}Yere tükürüyor.{/n} "Birilerini suçlamak istiyorsan dünyamızı bir yana atanları suçla! Valiyi suçla! {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahip{/g}leri suçla! En zor anında onu kaderine terk eden Kiava Gama'nın efendilerini suçla!"
traits.speaker: Footfall_Refugee
